question: What is the purpose of the ergo-play-boilerplate project?
answer: The ergo-play-boilerplate project provides a barebone code for newcomers to jump into the world of ergo development and get their feet wet quickly.

question: What is the role of edge in the Ergo development ecosystem?
answer: Edge can play a big part in the development ecosystem if it's being utilized, maintained and improved over time.

question: What is the Completeness of Ergo topic discussed in the Ergoversary Summit 2023 video?
answer: The Completeness of Ergo topic is discussed in the Ergoversary Summit 2023 video by Kushti.

question: What are the two GitHub projects mentioned in the document?
answer: The two GitHub projects mentioned are Edge (https://github.com/Ergo-Lend/edge) and ergo-play-boilerplate (https://github.com/kii-dot/ergo-play-boilerplate).

question: What is the purpose of the Completeness of Ergo video?
answer: The purpose of the Completeness of Ergo video is to discuss the completeness of the Ergo platform.
